title: Coconut Flour Cocoa Muffins
directions: In a bowl, whisk together coconut flour, almond flour, baking soda,salt and cocoa powder
In another bowl, whisk together eggs, butter, xylitol and vanilla extract until smooth and combined
Add the flour mixture to the egg mixture and stir until all lumps are gone
If the batter seems dry, stir in 1-2 tablespoons of almond or coconut milk
divide batter into 12 muffin tin cavities
Bake for 15-17 minutes until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
ingredients: 1-2 tablespoons almond milk or coconut milk if needed
